transArray.content: The front desk service is very good, the room is clean and tidy, and the facilities are complete. It is very convenient to control the whole house with Xiaodu. The robot is also very smart in delivering things. There are many restaurants downstairs next to the hotel. The location is good. I will stay at this Orange Hotel next time.
The heartfelt words are silent but sweet, the greetings are ordinary but warm, your trust is the most real, the friendship is elegant but the most precious. I wish you happiness and joy!
